verses.verse: Then <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, rose up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H5878>well<s%> of <S%H5878>Harod:<s%> so that the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of them, by the <S%H4480>hill<s%> <S%H1389><s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh,<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H854>with<s%> thee are too <S%H7227>many<s%> for me to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> vaunt <S%H6286>themselves<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Mine own <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H3467>saved<s%> me.

Now <S%H6288><s%> therefore go <S%H4994>to,<s%> <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Whosoever<s%> is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H2730>afraid,<s%> let him <S%H7725>return<s%> and depart <S%H6852>early<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> And there <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> and there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H5750>yet<s%> too <S%H7227>many;<s%> bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and I will <S%H6884>try<s%> them for thee <S%H8033>there:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that of <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H2088>This<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, the <S%H1931>same<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee; and of <S%H3605>whomsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H2088>This<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, the <S%H1931>same<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>go.<s%>

So he brought <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4325>water:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> Every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3952>lappeth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> with his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3952>lappeth,<s%> him shalt thou <S%H3322>set<s%> by <S%H905>himself;<s%> likewise every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> boweth <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them that <S%H3952>lapped,<s%> putting their <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H1290>knees<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> By the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H3952>lapped<s%> will I <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and let <S%H3605>all<s%> the other <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6720>victuals<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and their <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the rest of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H2388>retained<s%> those <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> him in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> get thee <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H4264>host;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> to go <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> thy <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the host: <S%H4264><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H4264>host.<s%> Then went he <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6513>Phurah<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the armed <S%H2571>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H4264>host.<s%>

And the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%> and the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> along in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> like <S%H697>grasshoppers<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and their <S%H1581>camels<s%> were <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H7945>by<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>side<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

And when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5608>told<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> unto his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> a <S%H6742>cake<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2015>tumbled<s%> into the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> a <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it that it <S%H5307>fell,<s%> and <S%H2015>overturned<s%> <S%H4605><s%> it, that the <S%H168>tent<s%> lay <S%H5307>along.<s%>

And his <S%H7453>fellow<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is nothing <S%H369>else<s%> <S%H1115>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for into his <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, when <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4557>telling<s%> of the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and the <S%H7667>interpretation<s%> thereof, that he <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

And he <S%H2673>divided<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> into <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in every <S%H3605>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> with <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> and <S%H3940>lamps<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H7200>Look<s%> <S%H4480>on<s%> me, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> when <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> that, <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do.<s%>

When I <S%H8628>blow<s%> with a <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H854>with<s%> me, then <S%H8628>blow<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> The sword of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>

So <S%H1439>Gideon,<s%> and the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H7097>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H821>watch;<s%> and they had <S%H389>but<s%> newly <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8104>watch:<s%> and they <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H5310>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3537>pitchers,<s%> and <S%H2388>held<s%> the <S%H3940>lamps<s%> in their <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and the <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> in their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H8628>blow<s%> withal: and they <S%H7121>cried,<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and of <S%H1439>Gideon.<s%>

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H8478>place<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H7321>cried,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> even throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host:<s%> and the <S%H4264>host<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H1029>Beth-shittah<s%> in <S%H6888>Zererath,<s%> and <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H8193>border<s%> of <S%H65>Abel-meholah,<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H2888>Tabbath.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6817>together<s%> out of <S%H4480>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H5321><s%> and out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites.<s%>

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> before <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1012>Beth-barah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6817>together,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1012>Beth-barah<s%> and <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And they <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb;<s%> and they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> upon the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H6159>Oreb,<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> at the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> of <S%H2062>Zeeb,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> on the other <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
